thread.title: Injustice: Gods Among Us update adds seven new playable characters and more - Gaming
thread.title_full: Injustice: Gods Among Us update adds seven new playable characters and more - Gaming News - Digital Spy

author: Albaraa Fahmy
title: Injustice: Gods Among Us update adds seven new playable characters and more - Gaming
text: Now might be a good time to jump back into Injustice: Gods Among Us.The mobile version of Warner Bros Interactive's fighting game has received a massive content update, featuring seven new playable characters and new challenges.The update also introduces a new Survivor mode and Gear Sets that enable characters to unlock powerful bonus effects.Developed by NetherRealm Studios, Injustice: Gods Among Us is available now on iOS and Android devices.The mobile title can connect with the console versions of the game, allowing users to earn achievements in both games that unlock six character skins in the other version.Our Injustice: Gods Among Us review: Comic capers at their finestCheck out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
